import "./f.css" export default function F6() { return (

If you don’t do this you are headed for trouble

  • Remember a person’s name is to that person the sweetest and most important sound to that person in any language
  • Average person is interested in his or her own name than in all the other names on earth put together
  • Remember a name and call it easily, and you have paid a subtle and easy compliment. But forget it and misspell it and you have placed yourself at a sharp disadvantage
  • People are so proud of their names that they try to perpetuate them at any cost
) }
